similar.title: The Royal College of Pathologists of Australasia (RCPA) position statement on COVID-19.
text: The Royal College of Pathologists of Australasia (RCPA) position statement on COVID-19.
For the detection of early COVID-19 disease, RCPA supports the use of molecular tests for SARS-CoV-2 and strongly opposes the introduction of COVID-19 IgG/IgM rapid tests for this purpose.
abstract: For the detection of early COVID-19 disease, RCPA supports the use of molecular tests for SARS-CoV-2 and strongly opposes the introduction of COVID-19 IgG/IgM rapid tests for this purpose.
